description: Bootstrap carousel component JavaScript implementation (version 3.2.0), defining the Carousel class with methods for cycling, sliding, and controlling carousel behavior.

classes.name: Carousel
classes.description: Class representing the Bootstrap carousel component, with methods for controlling carousel behavior such as cycle, pause, slide, next, prev, and to.

methods.name: keydown
methods.description: Handles keydown events for carousel navigation (left/right arrow keys).

methods.name: cycle
methods.description: Starts automatic cycling of carousel items based on interval.

methods.name: getItemIndex
methods.description: Returns the index of a given carousel item.

methods.name: to
methods.description: Navigates to a specific carousel item by position.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Moves to the next carousel item.

methods.name: prev
methods.description: Moves to the previous carousel item.

methods.name: slide
methods.description: Performs the slide transition to the next or previous item.
